resources.string: This is the main page, where important info will be displayed.
This is the settings page, Where users will be able to choose where they want to receive their message.

This app will text you an inspirational quote every morning, or whenever you want to receive one every day. 

It is still in progress, but will be public soon! 

Starfruit uses your phone's built-in messaging app to send quotes, keeping the app completely microtransaction and ad free! 

If you have any questions, comments, or feedback, then feel free to email me at xinyunzhouu@gmail.com!
A notification channel for the Starfruit app
